com.absio.file.mapper

Class PublicKeyMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.file.mapper.AbstractFileMapper
      • com.absio.file.mapper.AbstractDatabaseMapper
        • com.absio.file.mapper.PublicKeyMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPublicKeySource

    public class PublicKeyMapper
extends AbstractDatabaseMapper
implements IPublicKeySource
    This maps all public keys to/from the OFS and DataAccess. All create, read, update, and delete operations are handled by the mapper.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PublicKeyMapper(KeyRing keyRing, DataAccess dataAccess, OFS ofs)
      Create a PublicKey mapper for the OFS and data access.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Creates a data access entry for the given user ID and public key.
      void delete(UUID userId, Integer index, KeyType type, Boolean active)
      Deletes public key records from the data access.
      com.google.common.collect.ListMultimap<UUID,IndexedECPublicKey> get(UUID userId, Integer index, KeyType type, Boolean active)
      Gets a map of user IDs and public keys from the data access and the key ring if applicable.
      com.google.common.collect.ListMultimap<UUID,IndexedECPublicKey> getAll()
      Gets a map of all user IDs and public keys from the data access and the key ring if applicable.

      This gets the public key that match the user ID, type and inde.

      This gets the latest active public key that match the user ID and type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PublicKeyMapper

        public PublicKeyMapper(KeyRing keyRing,
                       DataAccess dataAccess,
                       OFS ofs)
                throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Create a PublicKey mapper for the OFS and data access.
        Parameters:
        keyRing - the key ring
        dataAccess - the data access for storing/retrieving the public keys
        ofs - the OFS for storing/retrieving the data access
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if an error occurs initializing the encryption engine

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(UUID userId,
                   IndexedECPublicKey publicKey)
            throws SQLException
        Creates a data access entry for the given user ID and public key.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID of the public key
        publicKey - the public key to store
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if an error occurs while storing the public key

      • delete

        public void delete(UUID userId,
                   Integer index,
                   KeyType type,
                   Boolean active)
            throws SQLException
        Deletes public key records from the data access. Deleted keys can be filtered by user ID, index, type, and active state.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID's public keys to delete
        index - the key index to delete
        type - the key type to delete
        active - the active state to delete
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if an error occurs while deleting the public key

      • get

        public com.google.common.collect.ListMultimap<UUID,IndexedECPublicKey> get(UUID userId,
                                                                           Integer index,
                                                                           KeyType type,
                                                                           Boolean active)
                                                                    throws SQLException,
                                                                           InvalidKeySpecException
        Gets a map of user IDs and public keys from the data access and the key ring if applicable. The public keys are optionally filterable by user ID, key index, usage type, and active state.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID to filter
        index - the key index to filter
        type - the key type to filter
        active - the active state to filter
        Returns:
        the map of user IDs to public keys
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if an error occurs accessing the data access
        InvalidKeySpecException - thrown if an error occurs decoding a stored key

      • getAll

        public com.google.common.collect.ListMultimap<UUID,IndexedECPublicKey> getAll()
                                                                       throws SQLException,
                                                                              InvalidKeySpecException
        Gets a map of all user IDs and public keys from the data access and the key ring if applicable.
        Returns:
        the map of user IDs to public keys
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if an error occurs accessing the data access
        InvalidKeySpecException - thrown if an error occurs decoding a stored key

      • getByIndex

        public IndexedECPublicKey getByIndex(UUID userId,
                                     KeyType type,
                                     int index)
                              throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: IPublicKeySource
        This gets the public key that match the user ID, type and inde.
        Specified by:
        getByIndex in interface IPublicKeySource
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id of the key owner
        type - the KeyType of the key
        index - the index of the key
        Returns:
        the IndexedECPublicKey for the user of the specified KeyType and index
        Throws:
        Exception - left open ended to allow the implementer to be less restrictive

      • getLatestActive

        public IndexedECPublicKey getLatestActive(UUID userId,
                                          KeyType type)
                                   throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: IPublicKeySource
        This gets the latest active public key that match the user ID and type.

        NOTE: if there is not an active key null will be returned.

        Specified by:
        getLatestActive in interface IPublicKeySource
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's ID
        type - the KeyType of public key
        Returns:
        the latest active public key for the user of the specified KeyType
        Throws:
        Exception - left open ended to allow the implementer to be less restrictive

        Parameters:
